articles.title: NVIDIA Plans to Reduce RTX 50 Production by Up to 40% in Early 2026 - TechPowerUp
articles.description: Reports from Asian supply chain sources suggest that NVIDIA might cut back on making GeForce RTX 50 series GPUs in the first six months of 2026, Videocardz reports. According to Board Channels, overall supply during H1 2026 could be down by roughly 30-40% com…
articles.content:
Consumer sector has no power to influence Nvidia whatsoever.In latest earnings report, out of 57 billion that went to Nvidia in third quarter, only 4.3 billion was from "Gaming and AI PC". 
That's o… [+655 chars]
